channel.title: GHES on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in GHES on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.20 release candidate is available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server 3.20 release candidate is available. The changelog post indicates improvements in deployment efficiency, monitoring, code security, and policy management, but provides no concrete details in the provided excerpt.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.19 is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.19 is now generally available. The release focuses on improving deployment efficiency, expanding monitoring capabilities, strengthening code security, and refining policy management with a more intuitive flow.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Upcoming deprecation of CodeQL Action v3
item.description:
GitHub released CodeQL Action v4 on October 7, 2025; v4 runs on the Node.js 24 runtime. CodeQL Action v3 will be deprecated at the same time as GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.19.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Server 3.18 is now generally available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.18 is now generally available. The release focuses on improving deployment efficiency, monitoring, code security, and policy management, and introduces the ability for enterprise administrators to define custom properties.

  • Source: GitHub
